channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Mozilla VPN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Mozilla VPN

item.title: CVE-2021-29978|2024-08-03T22:24:57.563Z -- mozilla -- mozilla%20vpn
item.description: Multiple low security issues were discovered and fixed in a security audit of Mozilla VPN 2.x branch as part of a 3rd party security audit. This vulnerability affects Mozilla VPN < 2.3.
